title: Hokuou Kizoku to Moukinzuma no Yukiguni Karigurashi
original_name: 北欧貴族と猛禽妻の雪国狩り暮らし
sinopse: This story tells the life of two people, a noble only in name and an older wife from the army, married through a tentative agreement. In the bone-chilling cold, they spend their time hunting, gutting, and cooking by the fireplace. Their daily life passes peacefully. This is the warm love story recounting their daily lives.
